body.text:
Step 1: Check whether the mail id and password is working.
Step 2: If you changed the password then we need to delete it in credentials manager.
Step 3: Click on start and type "windows credentials"
Step 4: Select Credentials Manager and remove the appropriate password from the Outlook entry.
Step 5: Open Outlook and enter new password there.
